name: World of Knowledge
description:
A game made by Nathan Satyabrata for P2 Project. This game is only in demo version, only one world is available to play. Note that the game may have some bugs so please report them if you can. Hopefully you can have some fun with the game.

Controls: A, D, SPACE (move left and right and jump), and P (attack enemies)

Attack enemies and collect flashcards that will be useful to fight bosses.

PLEASE GO TO FULLSCREEN MODE WHEN PLAYING THE GAME AS IT FIXED THE UI ISSUES

Thank you.
